Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Query" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The subscription %1 is created, but one or more channels in the query could not be read at this time.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Query" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Query" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The subscription %1 can not be created. The error code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Query" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Id" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The forwarder has successfully connected to the subscription manager at address %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SubscriptionManagerAddress" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The forwarder is having a problem communicating with subscription manager at address %1. Error code is %2 and Error Message is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SubscriptionManagerAddress" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorMessage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Subscription policy has changed. Forwarder is adjusting its subscriptions according to the subscription manager(s) in the updated policy.
A subscription policy contains invalid configuration. Description of policy is %1.
